posts.text: ä½¿ç”¨pyecartsè¿›è¡Œæ•°æ®å¯è§†åŒ– å®˜æ–¹ç½‘ç«™ https://gallery.pyecharts.org/#/ 58åŒåŸä¸€çº¿åŸå¸‚ä¹°æˆ¿ä¿¡æ¯æ•°æ®å¯è§†åŒ–1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950# _*_coding:UTF-8 _*_import MySQLdbfrom pyecharts import optionsfrom pyecharts.charts import Bar, Pie, Pagefrom pyecharts.globals import ThemeTypecity_list = ['åŒ—äº¬', 'å¤©æ´¥', 'ä¸Šæµ·', 'å—äº¬', 'å¤§è¿', 'æˆéƒ½', 'æ— é”¡', 'æ˜†æ˜', 'æ­å·', 'æ­¦æ±‰', 'è¥¿å®‰', 'é‡åº†', 'é•¿æ²™']def select_average_price(): average_list = [] conn = MySQLdb.connect(host='localhost', user='root', password='123456', port=3306, db='spider', charset='utf8') cursor = conn.cursor() for city in city_list: sql = 'select every_price from 58tc_xinfang where city="{}"'.format(city) cursor.execute(sql) price_list = cursor.fetchall() sum_price = 0 number = len(price_list) for price in price_list: sum_price += int(price[0].replace('å…ƒ/ã¡', '')) average = sum_price / number average_list.append(format(average, '.2f')) return average_listprice_list = select_average_price()print(price_list)# æŸ±çŠ¶å›¾bar_obj = ( Bar(init_opts=options.InitOpts(theme=ThemeType.MACARONS)) \ .add_xaxis((city_list)) \ .add_yaxis("", price_list) \ .set_global_opts(title_opts=options.TitleOpts("ä¹°æˆ¿å¹³å‡ä»·æ ¼å…ƒ/ã¡", subtitle='ä»…ä¾›å‚è€ƒ'), toolbox_opts=options.ToolboxOpts(), # å·¥å…·æ é€‰é¡¹ brush_opts=options.BrushOpts() # å·¥å…·åˆ·å¯¹è±¡ ))# é¥¼çŠ¶å›¾b_list = [list(i) for i in zip(city_list, price_list)]pie_ogj = ( Pie() .add("", b_list) .set_series_opts(label_opts=options.LabelOpts(formatter="{b}: {c}")))# pageå¯¹è±¡ç”¨äºæ•´åˆåœ°å›¾p = Page(layout=Page.SimplePageLayout)p.add(pie_ogj, bar_obj)p.render("ä¸€çº¿åŸå¸‚ä¹°æˆ¿ä¿¡æ¯æ•´åˆ.html")

åŒ¹é… base64 ç¼–ç çš„åŠ å¯†å­—ä½“å­—ç¬¦ä¸² base64_string = response.text.split("base64,")[1].split("'")[0].strip() # print(base64_string) # å°† base64 ç¼–ç çš„å­—ä½“å­—ç¬¦ä¸²è§£ç æˆäºŒè¿›åˆ¶ç¼–ç  bin_data = base64.decodebytes(base64_string.encode()) # ä¿å­˜ä¸ºå­—ä½“æ–‡ä»¶ with open('58font.woff', 'wb') as f: f.write(bin_data) print('ç¬¬' + str(page_num) + 'æ¬¡è®¿é—®ç½‘é¡µï¼Œå­—ä½“æ–‡ä»¶ä¿å­˜æˆåŠŸï¼') # è·å–å­—ä½“æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå°†å…¶è½¬æ¢ä¸ºxmlæ–‡ä»¶ font = TTFont('58font.woff') font.saveXML('58font.xml') print('å·²æˆåŠŸå°†å­—ä½“æ–‡ä»¶è½¬æ¢ä¸ºxmlæ–‡ä»¶ï¼') return response.text# å°†åŠ å¯†å­—ä½“ç¼–ç ä¸çœŸå®å­—ä½“è¿›è¡ŒåŒ¹é…def find_font(): # ä»¥glyphå¼€å¤´çš„ç¼–ç å¯¹åº”çš„æ•°å­— glyph_list = { 'glyph00001': '0', 'glyph00002': '1', 'glyph00003': '2', 'glyph00004': '3', 'glyph00005': '4', 'glyph00006': '5', 'glyph00007': '6', 'glyph00008': '7', 'glyph00009': '8', 'glyph00010': '9' } # åä¸ªåŠ å¯†å­—ä½“ç¼–ç  unicode_list = ['0x9476', '0x958f', '0x993c', '0x9a4b', '0x9e3a', '0x9ea3', '0x9f64', '0x9f92', '0x9fa4', '0x9fa5'] num_list = [] # åˆ©ç”¨xpathè¯­æ³•åŒ¹é…xmlæ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹ font_data = etree.parse('./58font.xml') for unicode in unicode_list: # ä¾æ¬¡å¾ªç¯æŸ¥æ‰¾xmlæ–‡ä»¶é‡Œcodeå¯¹åº”çš„name result = font_data.xpath("//cmap//map[@code='{}']/@name".format(unicode))[0] # print(result) # å¾ªç¯å­—å…¸çš„keyï¼Œå¦‚æœcodeå¯¹åº”çš„nameä¸å­—å…¸çš„keyç›¸åŒï¼Œåˆ™å¾—åˆ°keyå¯¹åº”çš„value for key in glyph_list.keys(): if key == result: num_list.append(glyph_list[key]) print('å·²æˆåŠŸæ‰¾åˆ°ç¼–ç æ‰€å¯¹åº”çš„æ•°å­—ï¼') # print(num_list) # è¿”å›valueåˆ—è¡¨ return num_list# æ›¿æ¢æ‰ç½‘é¡µä¸­æ‰€æœ‰çš„åŠ å¯†å­—ä½“ç¼–ç def replace_font(num, page_response): # 9476 958F 993C 9A4B 9E3A 9EA3 9F64 9F92 9FA4 9FA5 result = page_response.replace('&#x9476;', num[0]).replace('&#x958f;', num[1]).replace('&#x993c;', num[2]).replace( '&#x9a4b;', num[3]).replace('&#x9e3a;', num[4]).replace('&#x9ea3;', num[5]).replace('&#x9f64;', num[6]).replace( '&#x9f92;', num[7]).replace('&#x9fa4;', num[8]).replace('&#x9fa5;', num[9]) print('å·²æˆåŠŸå°†æ‰€æœ‰åŠ å¯†å­—ä½“æ›¿æ¢ï¼') return result# æå–ç§Ÿæˆ¿ä¿¡æ¯def parse_pages(pages): num = 0 ele = etree.HTML(pages) city = ele.xpath('//head/title/text()')[0].split('-')[1][:-4] title = ele.xpath('//h2/a/text()') rooms = ele.xpath('//div[@class="des"]/p[@class="room"]/text()') address = ele.xpath('//div[@class="des"]/p[@class="infor"]/a/text()') # subway_rule = '</em>(.*?) </p>' # subway = re.findall(subway_rule, pages) price = ele.xpath('//div[@class="money"]/b/text()') # print(title[0].split('\n')[1].strip()) # print(rooms[0].replace(' ','')) # print(address[0]+" "+address[1]) # print(subway[0].replace(' ','')) # print(price) print(len(title)) for i in title: index = title.index(i) try: if title[index] =='': title[index] == 'æ— ' data = [title[index].split('\n')[1].strip(), rooms[index].replace(' ', ''), address[index * 2] + " " + address[index * 2 + 1], price[index] + 'å…ƒ/æœˆ', city] num += 1 except Exception as e: print(e) save_to_mysql(data) print('ç¬¬' + str(num) + 'æ¡æ•°æ®çˆ¬å–å®Œæ¯•ï¼Œæš‚åœ2ç§’ï¼') time.sleep(2)# åˆ›å»ºMySQLæ•°æ®åº“çš„è¡¨ï¼š58tc_datadef create_mysql_table(): db = pymysql.connect(host='localhost', user='root', password='123456', port=3306, db='spider') cursor = db.cursor() sql = 'CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS 58tc_data (title VARCHAR(100) PRIMARY KEY,rooms VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, address VARCHAR(100) ,price VARCHAR(255),city VARCHAR(255) )' cursor.execute(sql) db.close()# å°†æ•°æ®å‚¨å­˜åˆ°MySQLæ•°æ®åº“def save_to_mysql(data): db = pymysql.connect(host='localhost', user='root', password='123456', port=3306, db='spider') cursor = db.cursor() sql = 'INSERT INTO 58tc_data(title,rooms,address,price,city) values(%s, %s, %s, %s,%s)' try: cursor.execute(sql, (data[0], data[1], data[2], data[3], data[4])) db.commit() except Exception as e: print(e) db.rollback() db.close()if __name__ == '__main__': # create_mysql_table() # print('MySQLè¡¨58tc_dataåˆ›å»ºæˆåŠŸï¼') for i in range(1, 71): url = 'https://bj.58.com/chuzu/pn' + str(i) + '/' response = get_font(url, i) num_list = find_font() pro_pages = replace_font(num_list, response) parse_pages(pro_pages) print('ç¬¬' + str(i) + 'é¡µæ•°æ®çˆ¬å–å®Œæ¯•ï¼') time.sleep(random.randint(3, 10)) print('æ‰€æœ‰æ•°æ®çˆ¬å–å®Œæ¯•ï¼')

posts.text: pythonè‡ªå®šä¹‰è¿­ä»£å™¨ pythonè‡ªå®šä¹‰è¿­ä»£å™¨çš„ç”Ÿæˆè¿­ä»£å™¨ä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯è¿­ä»£å™¨12345iter(å¯è¿­ä»£å¯¹è±¡ )å¯ä»¥è¿”å›è¿™ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡çš„çš„ è¿­ä»£å™¨å®ç°äº†__iter__å’Œ__next__æ–¹æ³•çš„å¯¹è±¡éƒ½æ˜¯è¿­ä»£å™¨å¯¹è±¡è¿­ä»£å™¨å¯¹è±¡æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¸¦çŠ¶æ€çš„å¯¹è±¡ __indexè®°å½•å½“å‰è¿­ä»£çš„ä½ç½®è¿­ä»£å™¨ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¯è¿­ä»£å¯¹è±¡,è€Œå¯è¿­ä»£å¯¹è±¡ä¸ä¸€å®šæ˜¯è¿­ä»£å™¨ 123456789101112131415#è‡ªå®šä¹‰å®ç°è¿­ä»£å™¨class Stack: def __init__(self,*args): slef.__items = list(args) self.__index = 0 def __iter__(self): return self def __next__(self): if self.__index < len(self.__items): item =self.__items[self.__index] self.__index +=1 return item else: raise StopIteration

posts.title: Clawer-çˆ¬è™«é‡‡é›†å…è´¹çš„ä»£ç†
posts.text: Clawer-çˆ¬è™«é‡‡é›†å…è´¹çš„ä»£ç†,å¹¶æµ‹è¯•ä»£ç†æ˜¯å¦å¯ç”¨ Clawer-çˆ¬è™«é‡‡é›†å…è´¹çš„ä»£ç†12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940# # _*_coding:UTF-8 _*_# é‡‡é›†ä»£ç†import refrom urllib import requestfrom lxml import etree#æµ‹è¯•åœ°å€test_url = "http://www.httpbin.org/ip"local_ip = request.urlopen(test_url).read().decode()url = "https://ip.jiangxianli.com/blog.html"res = request.urlopen(url).read().decode('utf-8')# with open('ip.html','w',encoding='utf-8') as w:# w.write(res)ele = etree.HTML(res)char_url_list = ele.xpath('//h3/a/@href')for char_url in char_url_list: res1 = request.urlopen(char_url).read().decode('utf-8') rule = '<p>(.*?)</p>' ip_port_list = re.findall(rule, res) for i in ip_port_list[1:]: ip_port = i.split('@HTTP')[0] ip_port1 = ip_port.lstrip() # print(ip_port1) # æ‹¼æ¥å¯¹åº”çš„ä»£ç†æ ¼å¼ dict1 = {} dict1['http'] = ip_port1 print("å¼€å§‹æµ‹è¯•ä»£ç†{}".format(dict1)) # æ„å»ºä»£ç†handler proxy_handler = request.ProxyHandler(dict1) opener = request.build_opener(proxy_handler) try: now_ip = opener.open(test_url, timeout=4).read().decode() if now_ip != local_ip: print("ä»£ç†å¯ä»¥ç”¨:{}".format(dict1)) with open("ip.txt", "a") as w: w.write(str(dict1) + "\n") print("å†™å…¥ip{}".format(dict1)) except: pass æµ‹è¯•ä»£ç†1234567891011121314151617181920# æµ‹è¯•ä»£ç†from urllib import requesttest_url = "http://www.httpbin.org/ip"local_ip = request.urlopen(test_url).read().decode()with open('ip.txt', 'r') as r: ips = r.readlines()for ip in ips: proxy_handler = request.ProxyHandler(eval(ip)) opener = request.build_opener(proxy_handler) try: now_ip = opener.open(test_url, timeout=4).read().decode() if now_ip != local_ip: print("ä»£ç†å¯ä»¥ç”¨{}".format(ip)) with open('ip1.txt', 'a') as w: w.write(str(ip) + "\n") except: pass

posts.text: ç®€å•çš„51jobçˆ¬å–äº”ä¸‡æ¡èŒä½ä¿¡æ¯,æ­£åˆ™åŒ¹é…æ•°æ®,ä»¥åŠjsonå¤„ç†æ•°æ® Clawer-51jobçˆ¬å–ç®€å•çš„51jobçˆ¬å–äº”ä¸‡æ¡èŒä½ä¿¡æ¯ æ­£åˆ™åŒ¹é…æ•°æ® 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334import gzip,refrom urllib import requestnum = 0for pn in range(1, 1462): url = "https://search.51job.com/list/000000,000000,0000,00,9,99,java,2,{}.html".format(pn) headers = { 'user-agent': "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:6.0) Gecko/20101101 Firefox/6.0", 'referer': 'url'} # 'user-agent': "baiduSpider"} req = request.Request(url) res = request.urlopen(req).read() try: res = gzip.decompress(res).decode('gbk') except: res = res.decode('gbk') jpb_name_rule = '"job_title":"(.*?)"' jpb_conmoany_rule = '"company_name":"(.*?)"' jpb_salary_rule = '"providesalary_text":"(.*?)"' jpb_place_rule = '"workarea_text":"(.*?)"' job_names = re.findall(jpb_name_rule,res) job_company = re.findall(jpb_conmoany_rule,res) job_salary = re.findall(jpb_salary_rule,res) job_place = re.findall(jpb_place_rule,res) with open('51job.txt', 'a', encoding='utf-8') as w: for job_name in job_names: index = job_name.index(job_name) w.write(job_name + " " + job_company[index] + " " + job_salary[index]+ " " + job_place[index] + " " + "\n") num += 1 if num == 50000: break print(num) jsonå¤„ç†æ•°æ®123456789101112131415import jsonimport refrom urllib import requestfor i in range(1, 6): url = "https://search.51job.com/list/010000,000000,0000,00,9,99,%25E9%2594%2580%25E5%2594%25AE,2,{}.html?lang=c&postchannel=0000&workyear=99&cotype=99&degreefrom=99&jobterm=99&companysize=99&ord_field=0&dibiaoid=0&line=&welfare=".format( i) res = request.urlopen(url).read().decode('gbk') # å› ä¸ºæ•°æ®å­˜æ”¾åœ¨scriptä¸­,jsonæ•°æ® ä½¿ç”¨json.loadsè§£åºåˆ—åŒ–;json.dumpsåºåˆ—åŒ– rule = '__SEARCH_RESULT__ = (.*?)</script>' job_dict = json.loads(re.findall(rule, res)[0]) for job in job_dict['engine_search_result']: if not job['providesalary_text']: job['providesalary_text'] = "é¢è®®" print(job['job_name'], job['providesalary_text'])

posts.text: crawlerâ€“çˆ¬å–å°è¯´ Crawler â€“çˆ¬å–ç¬”è¶£é˜å°è¯´123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839from lxml import etreefrom urllib import requestimport gzipurl = "http://www.xbiquge.la/xiaoshuodaquan/"result = request.urlopen(url).read()try: res = gzip.decompress(result).decode('utf-8')except: res = result.decode('utf-8')ele = etree.HTML(res)book_urls = ele.xpath('//div[@id="main"]//li/a/@href')for book_url in book_urls: book_res = request.urlopen(book_url).read() try: book_result = book_res.decode('utf-8') except: book_result = gzip.decompress(book_res).decode('utf-8') ele = etree.HTML(book_result) chapter_urls = ele.xpath('//div[@id="list"]/dl/dd/a/@href') book_name = ele.xpath('//h1/text()')[0] print(book_name) new_chapter_urls = ["http://www.xbiquge.la" + url for url in chapter_urls] print(new_chapter_urls) for chapter_url in new_chapter_urls: req = request.Request(chapter_url, headers={'user-agent': "baiduSpider"}) cha_res = request.urlopen(req).read() try: cha_result = cha_res.decode('utf-8') except: cha_result = gzip.decompress(cha_res).decode('utf-8') ele = etree.HTML(cha_result) content = ele.xpath('//div[@id="content"]/text()') cha_name = ele.xpath('//h1/text()')[0] with open(book_name + ".txt", "a", encoding="utf-8") as w: w.write(cha_name + "\n") for cont in content: w.write(cont) w.write("\n")

color: #999999; text-decoration: underline;}/* #content ol--------------------------------*/#content ol { padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 0 0 15px 0; line-height: 1.8em;}#content ol li { font-size: 1.1em;}#content ol li a:link, #content ol li a:visited { color: #73A822; text-decoration: none;}#content ol li a:hover { color: #73A822; text-decoration: underline;}/* #content p.paging ---------------------------------*/#content p.paging {padding: 5px;border: 1px solid #CBD6DE;text-align: center;margin-bottom: 15px;background: #eeeeee;}/* .small_input smaller text in inputs/combos-----------------------------------------------*/.small_input { font-size: 10px;}/* .form_table style for table used in forms---------------------------------------------*/.form_table { margin-bottom: 15px; font-size: 1.1em;}.form_table p { margin: 0; padding: 0;}.form_table td { padding: 5px 10px;}/* .checkbox_nomargins clear all margins from a checkbox---------------------------------------------------------*/.checkbox_nomargins { /*margin:0;width:13px;height:13px;overflow:hidden; font-size: 10px;*/ margin: 0; padding: 0;}/* .button some buttons style - inspired from wordpress------------------------------*/input.button { margin: 0; padding: 2px; border: 3px double #999999; border-left-color: #ccc; border-top-color: #ccc; background: url(../img/all/button.gif) repeat-x left top; font-size: 11px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;}/* form style for forms-------------------------*/form { padding: 0; margin: 0;}/* input.inputgri - some style for inputs--------------------------------------------*/input.inputgri, select.inputgri, textarea.inputgri { background: #eeeeee; font-size: 14px; border: 1px solid #cccccc; padding: 3px;}input.inputgri:focus, select.inputgri:focus , textarea.inputgri:focus { background: #ffffff; border: 1px solid #686868;}/* .notice - messages to user--------------------------------*/.notice { background: #CAEA99; border: 1px solid #70A522; padding: 15px 15px 15px 15px; margin-bottom: 15px; font-size: 1.2em; color: #333333;}.notice_error { background: #FEDCDA; border: 1px solid #CE090E; padding: 15px 15px 15px 15px; margin-bottom: 15px; font-size: 1.2em; color: #333333;}#notice a { color: #333333; text-decoration: underline;}/* Other links ----------------*/.other_links { background: #eeeeee; border-top: 1px solid #cccccc; padding: 5px; margin: 0 0 15px 0;}#content .other_links h2 { color: #999999; padding: 0 0 0 3px; margin: 0;}#content .other_links ul { padding: 0; margin: 0;}#content .other_links ul li { padding: 0 0 0 20px; background: url(../img/all/bullet_grey.gif) no-repeat left center;}#content .other_links a, #content .other_links a:visited { color: #999999; text-decoration: underline;}#content .other_links a:hover { color: #666666;}/* code */code { font-size: 1.2em; color: #73A822;} posts.text: ä½ å°†è®¾è®¡ä¸€ä¸ªæŠ•ç¥¨ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œé€‰ä¸¾å‡ºæ”¿å…šçš„å€™é€‰äººã€‚ æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå€™é€‰äººçš„åå•ï¼ŒæŠ•ç¥¨äººå°†ä»ä¸­é€‰å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªå€™é€‰äººä½œä¸ºé¢†å¯¼ã€‚ é€‰ä¸¾è§„åˆ™å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š æ¯ä¸ªæŠ•ç¥¨äººåªèƒ½æŠ•ç¥¨ä¸€æ¬¡ã€‚æŠ•ç¥¨äººé€šè¿‡äº§ç”Ÿä¸€ä¸ªéšæœºæ•°ï¼Œæ¥å†³å®šé€‰æ‹©å“ªä¸ªå€™ é€‰äººï¼Œè¯¥éšæœºæ•°å¤„äº1å’Œå€™é€‰äººæ€»æ•°ä¹‹é—´ã€‚ æ¯ä¸ªå€™é€‰äººéƒ½æ‹¥æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªè®°å½•ï¼ˆé›†åˆï¼‰ï¼Œè®°å½•ç€å“ªäº›æŠ•ç¥¨äººæŠ•äº†ä»–çš„ç¥¨ã€‚ é€‰ä¸¾ç»“æŸåï¼Œç¥¨æ•°æœ€é«˜çš„å€™é€‰äººå½“é€‰ã€‚ æŠ•ç¥¨ç³»ç»Ÿä¸€ã€æ¦‚è¿°You are tasked to implement a voting system for electing a leader of a political party. The process is as follows: ä½ å°†è®¾è®¡ä¸€ä¸ªæŠ•ç¥¨ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œé€‰ä¸¾å‡ºæ”¿å…šçš„å€™é€‰äººã€‚ The party has a list of candidatesï¼ˆå€™é€‰äººï¼‰ and the voterï¼ˆæŠ•ç¥¨äººï¼‰ attempt to elect one of the candidates as leader. æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå€™é€‰äººçš„åå•ï¼ŒæŠ•ç¥¨äººå°†ä»ä¸­é€‰å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªå€™é€‰äººä½œä¸ºé¢†å¯¼ã€‚ The voting rules are as follows: é€‰ä¸¾è§„åˆ™å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š Each voter can vote only once. The voter decides which candidate to choose by generating a random number between 1 and the total number of candidates. æ¯ä¸ªæŠ•ç¥¨äººåªèƒ½æŠ•ç¥¨ä¸€æ¬¡ã€‚æŠ•ç¥¨äººé€šè¿‡äº§ç”Ÿä¸€ä¸ªéšæœºæ•°ï¼Œæ¥å†³å®šé€‰æ‹©å“ªä¸ªå€™ é€‰äººï¼Œè¯¥éšæœºæ•°å¤„äº1å’Œå€™é€‰äººæ€»æ•°ä¹‹é—´ã€‚ Each candidate maintains a record of the voters that voted for him æ¯ä¸ªå€™é€‰äººéƒ½æ‹¥æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªè®°å½•ï¼ˆé›†åˆï¼‰ï¼Œè®°å½•ç€å“ªäº›æŠ•ç¥¨äººæŠ•äº†ä»–çš„ç¥¨ã€‚ After election, the candidate with the highest number of votes is elected é€‰ä¸¾ç»“æŸåï¼Œç¥¨æ•°æœ€é«˜çš„å€™é€‰äººå½“é€‰ã€‚ äºŒã€Program Deign: ç¨‹åºè®¾è®¡Part 1: ç¬¬ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†Design a Person class which includes the following è®¾è®¡ä¸€ä¸ªPersonç±» 1.1 å®ä¾‹å±æ€§å’Œç±»å±æ€§ â€‹ __name: contains the name of the person åå­—ã€‚ â€‹ __age: the age of the person å¹´é¾„ â€‹ __sexï¼šæ€§åˆ« â€‹ __salary: the persons salary (a real number) è–ªæ°´ï¼ˆå®æ•°ï¼‰ â€‹ __birthday: ç”Ÿæ—¥ ç±»å‹åº”è¯¥ä¸ºdatetime **__id**: the id of the person. A person id cannot be changed intentionally or unintentionally by any method (current or future). It is assigned by the program at creation time and it reflects the order in which the record was created. Namely, the first personâ€™s id is 1; the second personâ€™s id is 2 and so on. Personçš„idï¼Œidä¸èƒ½è¢«ä»»ä½•å‡½æ•°ä¿®æ”¹ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºPersonå¯¹è±¡æ—¶è¢«èµ‹å€¼ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”åæ˜  åˆ›å»ºçš„é¡ºåºã€‚ç¬¬1ä¸ªPersonçš„idæ˜¯1ï¼Œç¬¬2ä¸ªPersonçš„idæ˜¯2ï¼Œä¾æ­¤ç±»æ¨ã€‚ â€‹ __totalPersons: a static variable that maintains the total persons Personçš„æ€»æ•°ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªç±»å±æ€§ 1.2 æ–¹æ³• â€‹ a constructor __ init_ _(self,name:str,age:int,sex:bool,salary:float,year:int,month:int,day:int)//Qï¼šæ„é€ å‡½æ•°çš„å‚æ•°ä¸ºä½•æ²¡æœ‰idï¼Ÿ â€‹ å…¶å®ƒæ–¹æ³•å‚è€ƒã€Šäººå‘˜ä¿¡æ¯ç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿã€‹ 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273# _*_coding:UTF-8 _*_from datetime import dateclass Person(object): __totalPersons = 0 # æ€»äººæ•° # def __init__(self, name, age, salary, year, month, day): # Person.totalPersons += 1 # self.__name = name # self.__age = age # self.__salary = salary # self.__birthday = date(year, month, day) def __init__(self, name: str, age: int, sex: bool, salary: float, year: int, month: int, day: int): self.__sex = sex self.__age = age self.__name = name self.__salary = salary self.__birthday = date(year, month, day) Person.__totalPersons += 1 self.__id = self.__totalPersons def get_age(self): return self.__age def get_name(self): return self.__name def get_sex(self): return self.get_sex() def get_birthday(self): return self.__birthday def get_salary(self): return self.__salary def set_sex(self, sex): self.__sex = sex def set_name(self, name): self.__name = name def set_age(self, age): self.__age = age def set_salary(self, salary): self.__salary = salary def set_birthday(self, y, m, d): self.__birthday + date(y, m, d) # def __str__(self): # return "å§“å:%s,å¹´é¾„:%d,è–ªèµ„:%d" % (self.__name, self.__age, self.__salary) def get_toal_persons(self): return self.__totalPersons def __str__(self): return "å§“å:%s,å¹´é¾„:%s,æ€§åˆ«%s,æ—¥æœŸ:%s" % (self.__name, self.__age, self.__sex, self.__birthday) def output(self): print(self)if __name__ == '__main__': p1 = Person("John", 20, 6000, 2020, 1, 1) p2 = Person("John", 20, 6000, 2020, 1, 1) print(p1) print(type(p2)) Part 2: ç¬¬äºŒéƒ¨åˆ†Design a Voter class that will inherit from the Person class and will have the following fields: è®¾è®¡ä¸€ä¸ªVoterï¼ˆæŠ•ç¥¨äººï¼‰ç±»ï¼Œç»§æ‰¿è‡ªPersonç±»ã€‚ 2.1 å®ä¾‹å±æ€§å’Œç±»å±æ€§ â€‹ __polingStation:ï¼šthe number of the poling station that the voter needs to go and register â€‹ æŠ•ç¥¨äººè¦å»çš„æŠ•ç¥¨ç«™çš„id â€‹ __totalNumVotersï¼š a static variable that contains the total number of voters that each candidate has. â€‹ é€‰æ°‘æ€»äººæ•° 2.2 æ–¹æ³• the method def SelectCadidate(self,candidates:PersonList ) : randomly select a candidate é€‰æ‹©å€™é€‰äººï¼Œå‚æ•°æ˜¯å€™é€‰äººé›†åˆï¼Œéšæœºé€‰æ‹©ä¸€ä¸ªå€™é€‰äººå¹¶è¿”å›ã€‚ the method Vote(self, aCandidate:Candidate ): vote a candidate æŠ•ç¥¨å‡½æ•°ï¼Œé€‰å‡ºå€™é€‰äººä¹‹åï¼ŒæŠŠå½“å‰çš„æŠ•ç¥¨äººå¯¹è±¡ï¼ŒåŠ å…¥åˆ°è¯¥å€™é€‰äººçš„æŠ•ç¥¨ äººé›†åˆé‡Œã€‚ 12def Vote(self,aCandidate:Candidate): aCandidate.addVoter(self) 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556from person import Personfrom personlist import PersonListfrom candidate import Candidateimport randomclass Voter(Person): __totalNumVoters = 0 # id å’Œ Voteræ€»äººæ•° # def __init__(self, name, age, salary, year, month, day): # Person.__init__(self, name, age, salary, year, month, day) # Voter.totalNumVoters += 1 # self.__polingStation = polingStation # self.__id = Voter.totalNumVoters def __init__(self, polingStation, *args, **kwargs): self.__flag = False # æ ‡è¯†æŠ•ç¥¨çŠ¶æ€ self.__polingStation = polingStation Voter.__totalNumVoters += 1 super().__init__(*args, **kwargs) def select_cadidate(self, candidates: PersonList): # return candidates[index] # random.choiceéšæœºé€‰å‡ºå€™é€‰è€…å¯¹è±¡ return random.choice(candidates) # def get_age(self): # return self.__age # # def get_salary(self): # return self.__salary def vote(self, aCandiate: PersonList): # aCandiate.get_voterList().add(self) # ä½¿ç”¨å€™é€‰è€…çš„voterlistå­˜æ”¾æŠ•ç¥¨è€…å¯¹è±¡ # é™åˆ¶æ¯ä¸ªäººçš„æŠ•ç¥¨æ¬¡æ•° if self.__flag: # flag ä¸ºflase print("å·²ç»æŠ•ç¥¨,è¯·ä¸è¦é‡å¤æŠ•ç¥¨") else: # éšæœºé€‰å‡º,å°†è‡ªå·±æ·»åŠ ç»™å€™é€‰è€… aCandiate.add_voter(self) self.__flag = True print("æŠ•ç¥¨æˆåŠŸ") def get_total_voters(self): return self.totalNumVoters def resert_vote(self): # é‡ç½®æŠ•ç¥¨çŠ¶æ€ self.__flag = False Part 3: ç¬¬ä¸‰éƒ¨åˆ† Design a Candidate class that will inherit from Person class and will have the following: å€™é€‰äººç±»ï¼Œç»§æ‰¿è‡ªPersonç±» 3.1 å®ä¾‹å±æ€§å’Œç±»å±æ€§ â€‹ __voterList: the voterList contains all the voters that voted for the candidate. The set should not be limited in size. Use the container class PersonSet that you implemented in assignment â€‹ å®¹å™¨ç±»ï¼ŒåŒ…å«æ‰€æœ‰æŠ•ç¥¨ç»™è¯¥å€™é€‰äººçš„æŠ•ç¥¨äººï¼Œå®¹å™¨çš„å°ºå¯¸æ²¡æœ‰é™åˆ¶ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ä½œ ä¸š1ä¸­å®Œæˆçš„PersonListç±»ã€‚ â€‹ __numCandidates: a static variable that contains the total number of candidates which are still in the race for the leadership â€‹ å€™é€‰äººæ€»æ•°ã€‚ 3.2 æ–¹æ³• a method that returns the number of votes that the candidate received: getVotesNum() return the number of voters è¿”å›å€™é€‰äººå¾—åˆ°çš„é€‰ç¥¨æ•° getAverageVotersAge(): prints the average age of the voters that voted for the candidate æ‰“å°æŠ•ç¥¨ç»™è¯¥å€™é€‰äººçš„æŠ•ç¥¨äººçš„å¹³å‡å¹´é¾„ GetAverageVotersSalary(): prints the average salary of the voters that voted for the candidate æ‰“å°æŠ•ç¥¨ç»™è¯¥å€™é€‰äººçš„æŠ•ç¥¨äººçš„å¹³å‡è–ªæ°´ã€‚ 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465from person import Personfrom personlist import PersonListclass Candidate(Person): __numCandidates = 0 # å€™é€‰è€…id å’Œ å€™é€‰è€…æ€»äººæ•° # def __init__(self, name, age, salary, year, month, day): # Candidate.numCandidates += 1 # Person.__init__(self, name, age, salary, year, month, day) # self.__name = name # self.__id = Candidate.numCandidates # self.__voterList = PersonList() # voterlistå¯¹è±¡ def __init__(self, *args, **kwargs): # åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªå®¹å™¨ï¼Œç”¨äºè®°å½•è°ç»™å‚é€‰è€…æŠ•äº†ç¥¨ self.__voterList = PersonList() super().__init__(*args, **kwargs) Candidate.__numCandidates += 1 # def output(self): # print('å€™é€‰äºº:', self, 'id:', self.__id) def get_voterList(self): # è·å–ç§æœ‰å±æ€§voterList ç”¨äºå­˜æ”¾é€‰æ‹©å€™é€‰è€…çš„æ”¯æŒè€… return self.__voterList # def get_id(self): # è·å–ç§æœ‰å±æ€§ å€™é€‰è€…çš„id # return self.__id # # def get_name(self): # return self.__name def add_voter(self, voter): # æ·»åŠ æŠ•ç¥¨äºº self.__voterList.add(voter) def show_voters(self): # å±•ç¤ºå€™é€‰è€…çš„æ”¯æŒäººä¿¡æ¯ print(self.__voterList) def get_voter_number(self): # è·å–çš„ç¥¨æ•°é‡ return self.__voterList.size() # return len(self.__voterLisrt) def get_average_voter_age(self): sum = 0 for i in self.get_voterList(): sum += i.get_age() if self.get_voter_number(): return sum / self.get_voter_number() return 0 def get_average_voter_slary(self): sum = 0 for i in self.get_voterList(): sum += i.get_salary() if self.get_voter_number(): return sum / self.get_voter_number() return 0 def reset_voters(self): for i in range(self.__voterList.size()): # è¿›è¡ŒäºŒæ¬¡æŠ•ç¥¨,æ¸…ç©ºæ”¯æŒå€™é€‰è€…çš„åˆ—è¡¨ self.__voterList.pop() Part 5: ç¬¬å››éƒ¨åˆ†PersonListç±» 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273from person import Personclass PersonList: def __init__(self): self.__list = [] self.__index = 0 self.__index1 = 0 def __len__(self): # é»˜è®¤è¦†ç›–lenæ–¹æ³• return len(self.__list) def __getitem__(self, index): return self.__list[index] def add(self, person: Person): # æ·»åŠ person self.__list.append(person) def size(self): # å®¹å™¨ä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ ä¸ªæ•° return len(self.__list) def remove(self, person): self.__list.remove(person) def pop(self, index=None): if not index: return self.__list.pop() return self.__list.pop(index) # def output(self): # è¾“å‡ºæ‰“å°å®¹å™¨ä¸­çš„æ‰€æœ‰çš„personå¯¹è±¡ # for p in self.__list: # p.output() def reset(self): self.__index1 = -1 # é‡ç½®index def next_element(self): # è´Ÿè´£å¾ªç¯è¿­ä»£ if self.__index1 >= self.size(): self.__index = -1 self.__index += 1 return self.__list[self.__index1] def __iter__(self): self.__index = 0 # é‡ç½®ä¸‹æ ‡ return self def __next__(self): if self.__index < len(self.__list): item = self.__list[self.__index] self.__index += 1 return item else: raise StopIteration def __str__(self): string = "" for p in self.__list: string += p.__str__() + '\n' return stringif __name__ == '__main__': p1 = Person("John", 20, 6000, 2020, 1, 1) p2 = Person("John", 20, 6000, 2020, 1, 1) pl = PersonList() pl.add(p1) pl.add(p2) print(pl) # 1. æ„å»ºä¸€ä¸ªåºåˆ—æ¨¡å‹(ç©ºå£³) # å·ç§¯å±‚ï¼šfiltersï¼šå·ç§¯æ ¸ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œkernel_sizeå·ç§¯æ ¸å¤§å°ï¼Œstridesæ­¥é•¿ï¼Œpaddingè¡¥ç™½ # æ± åŒ–å±‚ï¼špool_sizeè¿‡æ»¤å™¨å¤§å°ï¼Œstridesæ­¥é•¿ # å…¨è¿æ¥å±‚Denseï¼šunitsç¥ç»å…ƒä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œactivationæ¿€æ´»å‡½æ•° model = Sequential() # 1. å·ç§¯æ± åŒ–å±‚ # å·ç§¯ï¼š96ä¸ªå·ç§¯æ ¸ï¼Œå·ç§¯æ ¸å¤§å°11 * 11 * 3ï¼Œæ­¥é•¿ä¸º4ï¼Œè¡¥ç™½ä¸º0 model.add(Conv2D(filters=96,kernel_size=(11,11),strides=(4,4))) # æ± åŒ–ï¼šæœ€å¤§æ± åŒ–å±‚ï¼Œè¿‡æ»¤å™¨çš„å¤§å°æ˜¯3 * 3 ï¼Œæ­¥é•¿ä¸º2 model.add(MaxPool2D(pool_size=(3,3),strides=(2,2))) # 2. å·ç§¯æ± åŒ–å±‚ # å·ç§¯ï¼š256ä¸ªå·ç§¯æ ¸ï¼Œå·ç§¯æ ¸å¤§å°5 * 5 * 3ï¼Œæ­¥é•¿ä¸º1ï¼Œè¡¥ç™½ä¸º2 model.add(Conv2D(filters=256,kernel_size=(5,5),padding='same')) # æ± åŒ–ï¼šæœ€å¤§æ± åŒ–å±‚ï¼Œè¿‡æ»¤å™¨å¤§å°3 * 3 ï¼Œæ­¥é•¿ä¸º2 model.add(MaxPool2D(pool_size=(3,3),strides=(2,2))) # 3. å·ç§¯å±‚ # å·ç§¯ï¼š384ä¸ªå·ç§¯æ ¸ï¼Œå·ç§¯æ ¸å¤§å°3 * 3 * 3 ï¼Œæ­¥é•¿ä¸º1ï¼Œè¡¥ç™½ä¸º1 model.add(Conv2D(filters=384,kernel_size=(3,3))) # 4. å·ç§¯å±‚ # å·ç§¯ï¼š384ä¸ªå·ç§¯æ ¸ï¼Œå·ç§¯æ ¸å¤§å°3 * 3 * 3ï¼Œæ­¥é•¿ä¸º1ï¼Œè¡¥ç™½ä¸º1 model.add(Conv2D(filters=384,kernel_size=(3,3))) # 5. å·ç§¯æ± åŒ–å±‚ # å·ç§¯ï¼š256ä¸ªå·ç§¯æ ¸ï¼Œå·ç§¯æ ¸å¤§å°3 * 3 * 3ï¼Œæ­¥é•¿ä¸º1ï¼Œè¡¥ç™½ä¸º1 model.add(Conv2D(filters=256,kernel_size=(3,3))) # æ± åŒ–ï¼šæœ€å¤§æ± åŒ–å±‚ï¼Œè¿‡æ»¤å™¨å¤§å°3 * 3ï¼Œæ­¥é•¿ä¸º2 model.add(MaxPool2D(pool_size=(3,3),strides=(2,2))) # 6. å…¨è¿æ¥å±‚ # 4096ä¸ªç¥ç»å…ƒï¼Œæ¿€æ´»å‡½æ•°ReLu model.add(Flatten()) model.add(Dense(units=4096,activation='relu')) # 7. å…¨è¿æ¥å±‚ # 4096ä¸ªç¥ç»å…ƒï¼Œæ¿€æ´»å‡½æ•°ReLu model.add(Dense(units=4096, activation='relu')) # 8. å…¨è¿æ¥å±‚ # 2ä¸ªç¥ç»å…ƒ,æ¿€æ´»å‡½æ•°ä½¿ç”¨sigmoidæˆ–è€…softmax model.add(Dense(units=2, activation='softmax')) # å¯¹æ¨¡å‹è¿›è¡Œç¼–è¯‘ model.compile(optimizer='adam',loss='sparse_categorical_crossentropy',metrics=['accuracy']) model.fit(X,Y,epochs=50)if __name__ == '__main__': # ä¸è¦ç”¨ä¸­æ–‡è·¯å¾„ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ dir_path = r'G:\AI\kaggle\train2' X,Y = load_datas(dir_path) X = X/255 create_model(X,Y)

print(text) r1 = re.findall('hour3data=(.*?})', text) r2 = r1[0] # ä½¿ç”¨jsonæŠŠå­—ç¬¦ä¸²è½¬ä¸ºå­—å…¸ r3 = json.loads(r2) today = r3['7d'][0] return todaytoday1 = get_data(url1)# åŒ—äº¬æ¸©åº¦today2 = get_data(url2)# ä¸Šæµ·æ¸©åº¦today3 = get_data(url3)# å¤ªåŸæ¸©åº¦# print([i.split(',')[3] for i in today1])c = (Bar() .add_xaxis([i.split(',')[0] for i in today1]) .add_yaxis('åŒ—äº¬æ¸©åº¦',[int(i.split(',')[3].strip('â„ƒ')) for i in today1])# åŒ—äº¬ .add_yaxis('ä¸Šæµ·æ¸©åº¦',[int(i.split(',')[3].strip('â„ƒ')) for i in today2])# ä¸Šæµ· .add_yaxis('å¤ªåŸæ¸©åº¦',[int(i.split(',')[3].strip('â„ƒ')) for i in today3])# å¤ªåŸ .set_global_opts(title_opts=opts.TitleOpts(title='å„åŸå¸‚å½“å¤©æ¸©åº¦'), toolbox_opts=opts.TitleOpts) )c.render('1.html')

ç»™ä¸€ä¸ªå®Œæ•´çš„è§†é¢‘ï¼Œå¯¹è§†é¢‘è¿›è¡Œå¤„ç†ï¼Œè¾¾åˆ°ï¼šç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„è§†é¢‘ï¼Œç”¨è‡ªå·±æƒ³è¦çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ¥ä»£æ›¿è§†é¢‘ä¸­çš„åŸæœ‰å…ƒç´ ã€‚ å­—ç¬¦ä¸²è§†é¢‘çš„ç”Ÿæˆ1ç»™ä¸€ä¸ªå®Œæ•´çš„è§†é¢‘ï¼Œå¯¹è§†é¢‘è¿›è¡Œå¤„ç†ï¼Œè¾¾åˆ°ï¼šç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„è§†é¢‘ï¼Œç”¨è‡ªå·±æƒ³è¦çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ¥ä»£æ›¿è§†é¢‘ä¸­çš„åŸæœ‰å…ƒç´ ã€‚ æ€è·¯123451. open-cvè§†é¢‘å¤„ç†åº“ pip install opencv-python2. å…ˆæŠŠè§†é¢‘é‡Œé¢æ¯ä¸€å¸§çš„å›¾ç‰‡éƒ½æŠ½å–å‡ºæ¥3. æŠŠæ¯ä¸€å¸§çš„å›¾ç‰‡éƒ½ç»™å¤„ç†æˆå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ç»„æˆçš„æ–°å›¾ç‰‡4. æ–°çš„å›¾ç‰‡ç»™ç»„åˆæˆä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„è§†é¢‘ã€‚ è¯»å–è§†é¢‘12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728# _*_coding:UTF-8 _*_'''1. open-cvè§†é¢‘å¤„ç†åº“ pip install opencv-python2. å…ˆæŠŠè§†é¢‘é‡Œé¢æ¯ä¸€å¸§çš„å›¾ç‰‡éƒ½æŠ½å–å‡ºæ¥3. æŠŠæ¯ä¸€å¸§çš„å›¾ç‰‡éƒ½ç»™å¤„ç†æˆå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ç»„æˆçš„æ–°å›¾ç‰‡4. æ–°çš„å›¾ç‰‡ç»™ç»„åˆæˆä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„è§†é¢‘ã€‚'''# CV2ä¸æ”¯æŒä¸­æ–‡ï¼Œä»»ä½•ä¸­æ–‡è·¯å¾„éƒ½ä¼šæŠ¥é”™import cv2# æ‰“å¼€ä¸€ä¸ªè§†é¢‘æµ,æ–¹æ³•ä¸­éœ€è¦ä¼ ä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•°ï¼Œé»˜è®¤æ— å‚ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºæ‰“å¼€æ‘„åƒå¤´ã€‚vidcap = cv2.VideoCapture(r'G:\CV\video\video.avi')# print(vidcap.read()) # print(success) ç¨‹åºç»ˆæ­¢ # æŠŠå½“å‰å¸§å›¾ç‰‡å†™å…¥åˆ°æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ä¸­ cv2.imwrite(r'G:\CV\pic\%d.jpg'%count,image) #è®°å½•é¡ºåºï¼Œå¹¶å‘½å%d.jpg count += 1# ä¸€å®šä¼šæŠ¥é”™ï¼Œä¼šåœ¨æœ€åä¸€æ¬¡ï¼Œè¯»å–æœ€åä¸€å¸§ï¼Œè¶…è¿‡æœ€åä¸€å¸§çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œä¼šæŠ¥é”™ã€‚ å¤„ç†è§†é¢‘å›¾ç‰‡ä¸ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²å›¾ç‰‡1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647# _*_coding:UTF-8 _*_from PIL import Image,ImageDraw,ImageFontimport osimport cv2'''CpythonåŸºäºCç¼–å†™ï¼ŒGILé”ï¼Œç›®çš„æ˜¯ä¸ºäº†é˜²æ­¢è„è¯»è„è¯»ï¼šæ— æ•ˆæ•°æ®çš„è¯»å‡ºï¼Œæ˜¯æŒ‡åœ¨æ•°æ®åº“è®¿é—®ä¸­ï¼Œäº‹åŠ¡T1å°†æŸä¸€å€¼ä¿®æ”¹ï¼Œç„¶åäº‹åŠ¡T2è¯»å–è¯¥å€¼ï¼Œæ­¤åT1å› ä¸ºæŸç§åŸå› æ’¤é”€å¯¹è¯¥å€¼çš„ä¿®æ”¹ï¼Œè¿™å°±å¯¼è‡´äº†T2æ‰€è¯»å–åˆ°çš„æ•°æ®æ˜¯æ— æ•ˆçš„ï¼Œå€¼å¾—æ³¨æ„çš„æ˜¯ï¼Œè„è¯»ä¸€èˆ¬æ˜¯é’ˆå¯¹äºupdateæ“ä½œçš„ã€‚'''def draw(pic): # è¯»å–åœ¨ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªç¨‹åºä¸­ä¿å­˜ä¸‹æ¥çš„æˆªå›¾ # æœ‰æ—¶å€™PILå’ŒCV2ä»–ä¸æ”¯æŒåæ–œæ ï¼Œéœ€è¦å°†åæ–œæ æ¢ä¸ºæ–œæ  # ç°åœ¨è¯»å‡ºæ¥çš„å›¾ç‰‡ï¼Œè™½ç„¶æ˜¯ä¸‰é€šé“ï¼Œä½†ä¸æ˜¯RGBï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯BGR img = cv2.imread('G:\CV\strVideo\pic\%s'%pic) # print(img) # æŠŠè¯»å‡ºæ¥çš„æ•°æ®BGRæ¢ä¸ºRGB # è¯»å‡ºæ¥çš„æ¯ä¸€å¼ å›¾ç‰‡éƒ½æ˜¯ä¸‰ç»´æ•°æ®ï¼Œ[å›¾ç‰‡é•¿ï¼Œå›¾ç‰‡å®½ï¼Œé€šé“å€¼] img = img[:,:,(2,1,0)] #åˆ‡ç¬¬ä¸‰ç»´ï¼ŒåŸæœ¬ä¸ºBGRï¼ˆ0ï¼Œ1ï¼Œ2ï¼‰ï¼Œéœ€æ”¹ä¸ºRGBï¼ˆ2ï¼Œ1ï¼Œ0ï¼‰ # print(img) # åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„ç©ºç™½ç”»å¸ƒ,å¦‚æœæœ€åcolorå€¼ä¸ä¼ æˆ–è€…ä¸ºNoneåˆ™é»˜è®¤ä¸ºé»‘è‰²å¡«å…… blank = Image.new("RGB",[len(img[0]),len(img)],"white") # åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæ–°ç”»å¸ƒï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨ç»™å®šå›¾åƒä¸Šè¿›è¡Œç»˜å›¾,éœ€è¦ç»™å®šè¦åœ¨å“ªä¸ªå›¾åƒä¸Šè¿›è¡Œç»˜å›¾ drawOBJ = ImageDraw.Draw(blank) n = 10 # è§„å®šè¦ä½¿ç”¨çš„å­—ä½“,å¹¶ä¸”è§„èŒƒå­—å· font = ImageFont.truetype(r'C:\Windows\Fonts\Microsoft YaHei UI\msyhbd.ttc',size=n-1) # éœ€è¦éå†æ–°å›¾åƒçš„æ¯ä¸ªåƒç´ ç‚¹ for i in range(0,len(img),n): #æ³¨æ„æ­¥é•¿n for j in range(0,len(img[i]),n): text = 'äººæ™ºçœŸæ£’' #é‡æ–°æ›¿æ¢æ‰€æœ‰å…ƒç´  drawOBJ.ink = img[i][j][0]+img[i][j][1] * 256 + img[i][j][2]*256*256 drawOBJ.text([j,i],text[int(j/n) % len(text)],font=font) # ä¿å­˜å›¾ç‰‡ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•°ä¸ºè·¯å¾„ï¼Œç¬¬äºŒä¸ªå‚æ•°ä¸ºä¿å­˜æ ¼å¼ print(i,j) # ä¿å­˜å›¾ç‰‡ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä¸ºè·¯å¾„ï¼Œç¬¬äºŒä¸ªä¸ºä¿å­˜æ ¼å¼ blank.save('new/new_'+pic,'jpeg')# è·å–åˆ°ä¼ å…¥è·¯å¾„ä¸‹çš„æ‰€æœ‰æ–‡ä»¶åfilelist = os.listdir(r'G:\CV\strVideo\pic')for file in filelist: draw(file)# print(filelist) å°†æ–°å›¾ç‰‡ç»„æˆæ–°çš„è§†é¢‘1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344# _*_coding:UTF-8 _*_import osimport cv2# æ’åºdef resort(list): for i in range(len(list)-1): #len(list)-1åé¢å–ä¸åˆ° for j in range(len(list)-1): # print(list[j+1].split('.')[0].split('_')[1]) å…ˆç”¨"."åˆ†ï¼Œç”Ÿæˆåˆ—è¡¨new_0ï¼Œåœ¨ç”¨"_"åˆ† # å†’æ³¡æ’åº è¿™é‡Œéœ€è¦æ³¨æ„è½¬æˆæ•´å‹åœ¨æ¯”è¾ƒï¼ŒåŸæ¥ä¸ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸² # å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ¯”è¾ƒçš„æ—¶å€™æ˜¯æŒ‰ä½æ•°æ¯”è¾ƒ if int(list[j].split('.')[0].split('_')[1]) > int(list[j+1].split('.')[0].split('_')[1]): list[j],list[j+1] = list[j+1],list[j] return listfilelist = os.listdir(r'G:\CV\strVideo
ew')filelist = resort(filelist)# fps=é¢‘ç‡ï¼ŒæŒ‡çš„æ˜¯æ¯ç§’é’Ÿæ˜¾ç¤ºå¤šå°‘å¼ ç…§ç‰‡fps = 24# å›¾ç‰‡çš„åˆ†è¾¨ç‡ é«˜ Ã— å®½# è§„å®šå¯¼å‡ºçš„æ–‡ä»¶åfile_path = r'G:\CV\strVideo\video
ew_video.avi'# è§„å®šå¯¼å‡ºçš„æ ¼å¼fourcc = cv2.VideoWriter_fourcc('I','4','2','0')# è§„å®šè§†é¢‘æµç¼–ç # ä¸åŒè§†é¢‘ç¼–ç å¯¹åº”ä¸åŒè§†é¢‘æ ¼å¼ï¼ˆä¾‹ï¼š'I','4','2','0' å¯¹åº”aviæ ¼å¼ï¼‰# fourcc = cv2.VideoWriter_fourcc('D', 'I', 'V', 'X') #mp4æ ¼å¼# åˆ›å»ºå†™å…¥è§†é¢‘å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œéœ€è¦è§„èŒƒè¾“å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„ã€ç¼–ç æ ¼å¼ã€fpsä»¥åŠå›¾ç‰‡åˆ†è¾¨ç‡# ç›¸å½“äºåˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªè§†é¢‘ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯è¯¥è§†é¢‘ä¸ºç©º# video = cv2.VideoWriter(file_path,fourcc,fps,size) sizeæ˜¯ç›¸åçš„video = cv2.VideoWriter(file_path,fourcc,fps,(960,540)) #éœ€è¦ç‰¹åˆ«æ³¨æ„åˆ†è¾¨ç‡é—®é¢˜# éå†å›¾ç‰‡å¾€è§†é¢‘é‡Œé¢å†™for item in filelist: item = os.path.join(r'G:\CV\strVideo
